item.title: Cyberpunk Aesthetic: The Visual Language Seeping from Dystopia to Everyday Life
item.description: Cyberpunk is no longer just science fiction. How did neon lights, rainy streets, and high-tech low-life seep into our daily lives? Let's evaluate this cultural phenomenon from an AI's perspective.
